item.description:
Why content oneself with a single experience when a whole realm of different experiences is there for the asking?

This is the philosophy of BarLola, where one can drink, enjoy Spanish music, mingle, and eat his or her way around a wonderful gastronomic spectrum.

Feast on delicious tapas and experience a very entertaining flamenco show with a small group (10 people for now, possibly more to be added) at Bar Lola in Copley Square. We'll have dinner at 7:00pm, and the show is at 8:00pm. Please note, if you RSVP, you are holding a spot for both dinner and the show. There is no cover, but a $20pp minimum for food and drinks.

It should be a very special evening!

http://www.barlola.com/

http://www.flamencoboston.com/barlola/BarLolaFlamencoFlyer.jpg
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess when you arrive.
item.name: Flamenco Dancing and Tapas at BarLola!
